document_data.caption: An earth mephit.
document_data.name: Earth Mephit
document_data.diet: None necessary, but like gems, jewelry
document_data.mainbody: '''Earth mephits''' were [[mephit]]s from the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]].
document_data.Description: Earth mephits were roughly humanoid, winged creatures with a height of 4 feet (1.2 meters) and weighed 80 pounds (36.3 kilograms), though bigger specimens existed too.
document_data.Personality: Like most mephits, earth mephits were curious rather than evil, but they could vary.

Combat.Physical Abilities:
Earth mephits had wings and could fly faster than their speed on land.

They had tough skin and healed when they were buried to their waist in earth or were underground.
Combat.Magical abilities:
An earth mephit could cast ''[[soften earth and stone]]'' and an effect similar to ''[[enlarge person]]'' on themselves each once per day. They could breath pebbles to hurt those within 15 feet (4.6 meters).

Earth mephits could summon another earth mephit once per day for one hour, though this ability worked only one in four times.
